meanings.definition: Mofos (n): Slang term for individuals or people.
meanings.sent1: Those mofos over there are always causing trouble.
meanings.sent2: The mofos at the party were dancing and having a good time.
meanings.sent3: I saw those mofos trying to sneak into the movie theater without tickets.
meanings.sent4: The mofos in the neighborhood are like a big, noisy family.
meanings.sent5: The mofos in the office always gossip about each other.

meanings.definition: Mofos (adj): Used to emphasize a particular quality or characteristic.
meanings.sent1: She is one tough mofos when it comes to challenges.
meanings.sent2: The cake was sweet, but that ice cream was mofos delicious!
meanings.sent3: His mofos determination to finish the race was inspiring.
meanings.sent4: The storm was mofos, with thunder shaking the windows.
meanings.sent5: The mofos sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: Mofos (v): To deceive or trick someone.
meanings.sent1: He tried to mofos his way out of paying for the damages.
meanings.sent2: She mofosed him into believing she was a famous singer.
meanings.sent3: The magician mofosed the audience with his disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The con artist mofosed the old lady into giving him her savings.
meanings.sent5: The prankster mofosed his friends by pretending to be a ghost.
